0.name: An informal definition of limit
0.description: In order to speak meaningfully about rates of change, tangent lines, and areas bounded by curves, we have to investigate the process of finding limits. Indeed, the concept of limit is the cornerstone on which the development of calculus rests.

1.name: When Limits Fail to Exist
1.description: Ways that limits can fail to exist: limit from the left is not equal to limit from the right, vertical asymptotes, wild behavior

2.name: Intro to Limit Laws
2.description: Limit laws make it easy to calculate limits and one-sided limits of many kinds of functions when we know some elementary limits.
